EmailTemplate.name: Request a Trial.Marketo Follow-up - Email 5 (API Test Automation with Tosca) - V
EmailTemplate.subject: API Test Automation with Tosca!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
API Test Automation with Tosca!
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
We hope you’ve enjoyed this trial. We would like to provide one last tip before your trial ends! API testing can be tedious and stressful for companies that depend on their Service Oriented Architecture. Tosca Testsuite provides excellent test automation for web services. Here are a few videos that may be interesting for you:
- Creating Modules by Scanning a web service <http://vimeo.com/118483539>
- Creating New Testcases <http://vimeo.com/118483540> with previously scanned modules
- Creating Modules by Scanning a WSDL file <http://vimeo.com/118483541>
Hope you’ve found this helpful!
Best wishes,
The Tricentis Team trial@tricentis.com <mailto:trial@tricentis.com>
Product and Licensing For further questions regarding product or licensing, please contact our Tricentis sales team: Website <http://innovate.tricentis.com/talk-with-sales.html> | e-mail <mailto:sales@tricentis.com>
Events & Webinars Stay informed with our regular events and webinars which you can find here <http://www.tricentis.com/about/events>!
Support Technical support is available to provide help during the trial period. Please contact the Tricentis support team here: Website <https://support.tricentis.com/community/> | e-mail <mailto:support@tricentis.com>
